name: $socialEventData
description: Returns event data for any forgesocial events

name: $searchReddit
description: Search Reddit for posts, comments, users, or subreddits

args.name: query
args.description: The search query string

args.name: type
args.description: Type of result to return: link, comment, sr, user, or all

args.name: limit
args.description: Maximum number of results (default: 25)

args.name: sort
args.description: Sorting method (relevance, hot, new, top, comments)

name: $getRandomSubreddit
description: Get Random Subreddits info

args.name: filter
args.description: Filter subreddit list by 'popular' or 'new'

args.name: limit
args.description: Maximum number of subreddits to return (max 25)

name: $getSubreddit
description: Get the subreddit about page of the name you gave

args.name: subreddit
args.description: The subreddit to get the about page of

name: $getSubredditFeed
description: Get the readable subreddit feed (title, author, upvotes, etc)

args.name: subreddit
args.description: The subreddit to get the feed of

args.name: filter
args.description: Filter the posts by what you want bbg

args.name: limit
args.description: Maximum number of posts to return (max 25)

name: $getSubredditRules
description: Get the rules for a subreddit

args.name: subreddit
args.description: The subreddit to get the rules for

name: $trackSubredditsList
description: Returns all active tracked subreddits

name: $removeTrackedSubreddit
description: Returns removes subreddit from tracking

args.name: name
args.description: subreddit name

name: $searchSubredditPosts
description: Search for posts within a specific subreddit

args.name: subreddit
args.description: The subreddit to search in

args.name: query
args.description: The search query string

args.name: limit
args.description: Maximum number of results (default: 25)

args.name: sort
args.description: Sorting method (relevance, hot, new, top, comments)

name: $trackSubreddit
description: Track subreddits new posts

args.name: subreddit
args.description: The subreddit to track

name: $getUser
description: Get the users info about page of the name you gave

args.name: username
args.description: The username to get the info of (without u/)

name: $getUserActivity
description: Get the users activity page of the name you gave

args.name: username
args.description: The username to get the activity of (without u/)

name: $getUserComments
description: Get the users comments page of the name you gave

args.name: username
args.description: The username to get the comments of (without u/)

name: $getUserOverview
description: Get the users overview

args.name: username
args.description: The username to get the overview of (without u/)

name: $getUserSubmissions
description: Get the users submissions page of the name you gave

args.name: username
args.description: The username to get the submissions of (without u/)

name: $getUserTrophies
description: Get the users trophies

args.name: username
args.description: The username to get the trophies of (without u/)

name: $getWiki
description: Get the subreddit wiki index page of the name you gave

args.name: subreddit
args.description: The subreddit to get the wiki index page of

name: $getWikiPage
description: Get the subreddit wiki page.

args.name: subreddit
args.description: The subreddit to get the wiki pages of

args.name: page
args.description: The page name to get

name: $getWikiRevisions
description: Get the subreddit wiki page revisions. Returns all revisions if page not specified.

args.name: subreddit
args.description: The subreddit to get the wiki revisions of

args.name: page
args.description: The page name to get the revisions of

name: $extractVideoID
description: Extracts a YouTube video ID from a URL or string.

args.name: input
args.description: YouTube URL or video ID

name: $getYoutubeChannel
description: Gets info about a YouTube channel by ID or handle.

args.name: identifier
args.description: Channel ID or handle (e.g. UC... or @username)

name: $listTrackedYoutubeChannels
description: Returns a list of all tracked YouTube channel IDs.

name: $searchYoutube
description: Searches YouTube and returns the top videos in JSON format. Supports filters.

args.name: query
args.description: The search query to look up on YouTube

args.name: limit
args.description: Maximum number of videos to return (default 5, max 25)

args.name: uploadDate
args.description: Upload date filter

args.name: duration
args.description: Video duration filter

args.name: sortBy
args.description: Sort results by

args.name: features
args.description: Features to filter by

name: $searchYoutubeChannel
description: Searches YouTube and returns matching channels in JSON format.

args.name: query
args.description: Search query for YouTube channels

args.name: limit
args.description: Maximum number of channels to return (default 5, max 25)

args.name: sortBy
args.description: Sort results by (optional)

name: $searchYoutubeMusic
description: Searches YouTube Music and returns songs in JSON format.

args.name: query
args.description: Search query for music

args.name: limit
args.description: Max number of songs to return (default 5, max 25)

name: $searchYoutubePlaylist
description: Searches YouTube and returns the playlists in JSON format. Supports filters.

args.name: query
args.description: The search query to look up on YouTube

args.name: limit
args.description: Maximum number of playlists to return (default 5, max 25)

args.name: uploadDate
args.description: Upload date filter

args.name: duration
args.description: Video duration filter

args.name: sortBy
args.description: Sort results by

args.name: features
args.description: Features to filter by

name: $trackYoutubeChannel
description: Starts tracking a YouTube channel and emits events on new uploads.

args.name: channelId
args.description: The channel ID to track (e.g. UC_x5XG1OV2P6uZZ5FSM9Ttw)

name: $unTrackYoutubeChannel
description: Stops tracking a previously tracked YouTube channel.

args.name: channelId
args.description: The channel ID to untrack.

name: $getYoutubeVideo
description: Returns the youtube videos info.

args.name: ID
args.description: The video ID to get info about
